author.name: 弗兰克·德拉邦特 Frank Darabont

title: The Shawshank Redemption
summary: In the late 1940s, Andy (Tim Robbins), an accomplished young banker, is jailed for killing his wife and her lover.In the shawshank prison, hope seems to be elusive. The punishment of life imprisonment undoubtedly doomed Andy to a gloomy and desperate life.Before long, Andy tries to approach the prisoner's most famous character, red (Morgan Freeman), and asks for a hammer.Take this as an opportunity, 2 people are gradually familiar with, Andy also seems to find the way that belongs to him to live in the jail of jumpily mixed, evil, black and white confusion.He used his expertise to help the prison management evade taxes and launder money. Meanwhile, he was gradually treated with respect among prisoners by virtue of his association with rhett.On the face of it, he had changed from hating the wall to taking it in stride, as rhett had done.And the truth about his crimes seems to have taken it a step further...â†µ the film according to the famous writer Stephen King (Stephen Edwin King) based on the original.
